website_summaries.verdict: A good entry-level or practice flute for those who don't want to take risks with higher quality instruments.
pros: Leather pads for water resistance and air tightness
Comes with tuning rod, polish cloth, cork grease, and white gloves
cons: Tarnishes a little near mouth and thumb

customer_reviews.title: Will not rent and the best buy for a new student!
customer_reviews.text: If you are a new "band" parent, let me save you the headache! Do not rent an instrument and pay 3 times the cost for something your child cannot keep! I am so pleased with this instrument and it is ours to keep. I would recommend this flute to anyone looking to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Robin M.

customer_reviews.title: AWFUL!
customer_reviews.text: With this, you definitely get what you pay for. It was a cheaper flute, and wasn’t sure my daughter was going to stick with band. I spent 70$ to buy it, but the flute couldn’t play several notes (e flat, f..etc.). When we found out that one of the keys to play the note didn’t close all the way ( there was the smallest gap that let air out), we paid $40 to fix it. Find out that now other keys have the same issue. Done putting money into a piece of junk. As of right now, I have spent $110 on something that does nothing but sit in the carrying case in my daughters closet. Pure JUNK!!!
customer_reviews.author: Christina B

customer_reviews.title: Looks the part, plays horribly.
customer_reviews.text: Looks the part, plays horribly. This will frustrate and discourage players. I bought this as a replacement for another cheap flute. My daughter immediately was unimpressed with the sound and difficulty in getting notes to play. The case and accessories were nice but the flute is a big miss. Don't look under the $300 range. Buy used if you have to. Play first if possible.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron B.

customer_reviews.title: You can’t go wrong with this flute
customer_reviews.text: This flute is an amazing value. We bought this for our 10 year old who has never played the flute before. It plays just as well as the $2,000 flute her school recommended. It is cheaper to buy one of these flutes than to have another flute serviced! Why terrify your child with the responsibility of taking care of a $2,000 instrument. That seems like too much responsibility to put on a young child. If you are thinking of buying this flute for anyone under 18 - do it. You can’t go wrong! We love the way it sounds and so does her instructor!
customer_reviews.author: James A.

customer_reviews.title: A flue that's cheap enough to just mess around with!
customer_reviews.text: I've never played flute before. I played trumpet way back in middle school and simply wanted to relive that new band instrument experience now in my 30s. The flue is quieter than a trumpet, and much easier to disassemble and stow away. This flute fit my needs perfectly. I've been at it for a few months now and I can easily play the lower octave down to the low C, but the higher notes are still a struggle. After learning all the fingerings for the notes, I keep this flute out on a stand at all times to just pick up and tinker with whenever the mood strikes. It's been a lot of fun learning and playing!
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: You won't regret buying this
customer_reviews.text: This was an excellent buy. I bought this so my ten year old daughter could take an inexpensive flute to school for the fifth grade and I could keep my more expensive flute that she's been beating up at home this was so nice I didn't want her to take it to school it plays beautifully the case is high-quality it comes with all the accessories it's perfect
customer_reviews.author: Your best tester

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: I'm in high school and I bought this flute for the marching season; it's such a great value for the money you spend. I just wish they included a cleaning cloth to clean the inside of the instrument. The only minor inconvenience is that when it comes straight out the package; some notes won't play such as the B natural. However; that is because the flute is still new and the keys are still compacted, and you have to play around a bit for the keys to naturally loosen. Once you've done this, you will produce a very vibrant sound that I think is even comparable to my $750 Yahama Flute!
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Flute key broke less than 2 months since purchase
customer_reviews.text: My son was initially pleased with the flute and was using it for his school symphony classes. Last Friday one of the keys broke and he had to play his first school symphony that evening minus that key. I contacted Amazon and unfortunately, the return period just passed (we only had the flute for less than 2 months). Went to a music instrument repair shop and was informed that the flute is not repairable so now need to shop for a new one at a music store :(.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great flute.. Great Price.. Great Service
customer_reviews.text: I really liked that this international delivery was a day before schedule. The flute, my daughter's gift, is her choice of instrument to learn, and this is a great beginner flute to own with lots of learning potential available from the instrument. I know that this Glory Closed Hole C Flute has a good sound because my daughter's instructor plays it beautifully. I also really like that this flute has the case and the cleaning and maintenance accessories all included in one very affordable price. Based on my experience I definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Yve T

customer_reviews.title: The smell is foul
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 2nd year band with the flute and it works fine so far for what she needs. We just got it and she did her best playing. The only reason I’m giving it 3 stars is that it stinks. Like really smells bad. It smells like dirty gym socks. The entire flute inside, the gloves, the case, it’s bad. Not sure how to clean that smell out of it or if this is normal. Will update review after a while to see how it goes.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: The flute looks nice..
customer_reviews.text: The flute looks nice... And I knew when I got this it is a "you get what you pay for" thinking I had going on. So now we have already had to have it in a music shop for repair and its only been a few months since I got it. The music shop won't guarantee my repair because it is considered an unfamiliar brand. Oh well it is what it is. Still works alright... Perhaps until it has to go in the shop again.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Simerl

customer_reviews.title: DEFECTIVE INSTRUMENTS MISSING A PART THAT KEEPS YOU FROM BEING ABLE TO PLAY ANY RIGHT HAND NOTES
customer_reviews.text: JUST GOT IT OUT OF THE BOX IMMEDIATELY NOTICED I CAN'T PLAY ANY RIGHT HAND NOTES.....AS I EXAMINED AND COMPARED IT TO MY OTHER FLUTE I QUICKLY REALIZE THIS FLUTE IS MISSING A PART NEXT TO THE KEY TO THE RIGHT OF THE G. THIS IS RIDICULOUS CLEARLY THIS COMPANY IS KNOWN FOR SELLING DEFECTIVE INSTRUMENTS I SHOULD HAVE READ THE REVIEWS BEFORE GETTING THIS RAGGEDY FLUTE A WASTE OF METAL....YOU ALL OUGHT TO BE ASHAMED OF YOURSELVES I LOOKED AT THE PICTURES AND EVEN YOUR PICTURES SHOW DEFECTIVE FLUTES BUT ONE WOULDN'T KNOW UNLESS THEY WERE LOOKING FOR THE REASON NONE OF THE RIGHT HAND NOTES WORK
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So sad for her
customer_reviews.text: was very unhappy with this product. My granddaughter was so excited to get it too. She couldn't hit the notes, she thought it was her. She took it to school so her teacher could see it. And that's when we found out that it couldn't be fixed. So sad for her. We sent it back and got a refund without any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy B.

customer_reviews.title: They keep sending me the wrong one.
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a fine flute. Good for a beginner. However, customer service is terrible and they have sent me the wrong one 3 times now. I finally just kept the last one because I needed one for my daughter. If you're looking for a color, like my daughter wanted, you might be disappointed. I do want to add that today I read that the colored ones have a tendency to chip and peel. So it's probably better they kept screwing up.
customer_reviews.author: rachpg

customer_reviews.title: Mixed feelings......
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this instrument a short period and have mixed feelings about how well it plays. I'm not sure if it's me or the instrument but it's hard to get the notes to sound the same each time I play them. One thing I do want to say is that if your skin is sensitive to metals you may want to think about purchasing this. It's solid and has a nice weight but playing it irritates my skin. I'm going to have to purchase a yamaha like I use to play.
customer_reviews.author: jodired

customer_reviews.title: Great Instrument for the $
customer_reviews.text: My kid wanted to play the flute... for school band to rent the equipment it cost more for the school year then just buying this one... I didnt expect much I figured if she was going to be in band for the long haul I would get her a better one... Wen we got it I who played the flute 30 years ago most recently was easily able to get good sound out of it a few scales to my surprise and she loved that hers was different then the other kids playing flute. For a trial instrument I very much recomend this flute.
customer_reviews.author: C. wiest

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: This is my son's second Glory flute. The first lasted him nearly two school years until the purple paint started chipping and the sound became just a bit off. I decided why not get him another for the price, especially if it lasts another two years. It's much less expensive than renting a flute from the music shop that provides rentals for our school district. Sure it's not a hundreds or thousands of dollar instrument, but for my 12 year old who enjoys playing in the school band, it's fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Nichole B.

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: I like that its non traditional and comes in a color. Having the only Male flute player he appreciates getting a black flute. We weren't sure he was going to stick with it so we went cheap. He is also on his 2nd one of these in 3 years. We repaired the 1st one 3 times and lost a LOT of the black finish. We picked him up a 2nd one because 1. The black 2. Can't beat the price in a pinch (kids never break things at a financially healthy time). Quality seems to have improved....
customer_reviews.author: von Busse

customer_reviews.title: don't waste your money!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this flute, going against the reviews hoping and praying that maybe they corrected the flaw. Well after having the flute for just 6 weeks , the F key broke! This is ridiculous! We needed the flute for our daughter who is in the marching band, but were on a very tight budget. Now we are out of a flute and out of the 200 dollars! Buyers don't waste your hard earned money for something that won't last! Completely disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: michelle lester

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality at nice price!
customer_reviews.text: Shocked at the quality of this flute! Sounds just as good and even better than some of the other flites I've owned. I only have four stars and not five because I didn't receive a stand.. I had read some reviews before purchasing and everyone said they got one..would've been cool, always wanted to be able to leave my instrument out because the flute is beautiful! Never would have thought I'd have a purple flute, that sounds awesome, for under 100$! Really good for parents with kids renting instruments, probably cheaper and the child gets to say it's theirs😍
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Not so great.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this flute to see if it would work for beginner students. I'm wanting to work with some inner city youth this summer and needed an expensive flute they could use. The sound is ok. The high register is difficult but that could be beneficial if they transition to a better quality flute. However it does not fit together well. I am planning to do a little metal finishing to see if that will help. If it doesn't it'll be a fail. Putting it together and taking it apart will be to difficult and will bend the keys.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value
customer_reviews.text: I haven't played flute in years, but it was a joy to play this flute which was very inexpensive, but with outstanding quality for the money. The tone is crisp and with the silver plating, B foot and open holes it has an airy fullness to the tone and easy to play.
customer_reviews.author: Angus

customer_reviews.title: So i cant say for sure if it was like that when we got it or what
customer_reviews.text: My daughter used it for a few days, one day here and there since she got a green one thats different brand that is her go to. Today she goes and tries to use this one and a few high notes dont play. So i cant say for sure if it was like that when we got it or what. That is dissapointing
customer_reviews.author: smiling faces

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with air leaks and old pads
customer_reviews.text: I took this brand new flute to my son's professional flute teacher who identified at least 3 key leaks-and I could see that they did not cover the holes as needed. For an inexpensive flute, this still isn't good. The tone was muffled, keys were unevenly weighted, higher and lower registers were okay, but the Mugig we'd bought before was still WAY better. I'd look somewhere else.
customer_reviews.author: B. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter two years ago for 4th grade beginning band. She used it through the end of 5th grade. Up until the end of this school year, the flute functioned perfectly. Now the keys are sticking a bit. I'm okay with that. For the price, I had hoped it would work for a year before replacing or repairing it. I'm incredibly happy with this flute and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: When I receive it the appearance was very good, when she played it the sound was good ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchase This flute for my daughter because it was the #1 seller on amazon. When I receive it the appearance was very good, when she played it the sound was good but after only one month it started to self dismantle,the paint started to peel the overall construction is very poor.
customer_reviews.author: junior  gordon

customer_reviews.title: Teenage son approved!
customer_reviews.text: My teenage son LOVES this flute. He orginally asked for a name brand $1200 version, to which we said no. We found this and even though it's much less expensive, he said it plays great! He likes that there are plugs to make it a closed hole flute if needed, but he prefers playing it with the open holes. It sounds just like the closed hole flute he has. He actually plays in front of us with this flute which was an added bonus!!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Very cheap. The valves were all misaligned and needed to be serviced. The repair shop said it would be $95 to repair it. That's more then the flute cost. Waste of money. The only good point is that it is cheap and your child can try it and see if they want to play the flute before you spend a lot for a quality one and it sits on their shelf never used.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: New band class needed a beginner flute
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time with next day delivery. It is just as described and pictures match. My son has to learn the flute in band class. This option works better financially compared to renting or buying a top line flute. It’s a beautiful flute and works great so far. The accessories are very nice as well. It’s nice this delivers an all in one package to meet all the beginner needs.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Hope

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to get my niece off the mobile phone and Youtube and learning something, and thought learning an instrument would be a great way to connect, teach, share, and shape her creativity. Something to do when she's "bored". (kids today. LOL). For the price, can't beat this is a beginner musician's instrument, and even she wrecks or doesn't "keep it up" doesn't damage the pockets. But she seems very excited especially the cool red color.
customer_reviews.author: LitMavenDFW

customer_reviews.title: Great flute for my daughter
customer_reviews.text: Great flute for my daughter, she is a beginner, and we wanted to start her off with a good quality flute. The case seems very durable, which will be great for taking to & from school every week. Comes with everything you need
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality and Value
customer_reviews.text: At some point during several moves, I lost my beloved flute. After playing it for 10 years, I was hesitant to get another one. However, I missed playing and decided to buy this one. Best. Decision. Ever. This flute has amazing tone quality for the price. It's not professional-level of course, but this will get you through high school and college. Haven't had it long enough to tell how sturdy it is long-term, but I do not foresee any problems. I highly recommend this flute for a beginner or intermediate player, especially if you are like my parents were and afraid to invest in something you aren't sure your kid will continue. ;)
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Defect Key
customer_reviews.text: Sadly I didn't get a chance to play with it until a month and half after I got it. And that's then I found out one of the hole that is supposed to covered as we press another key cannot be covered properly, it leaves just a tiny bit of gap for the air to come out which makes notes like G and A impossible to be played. Lesson is to take a very close look as soon as you get it to make sure there is no defect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful flute!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this flute for my daughter who has been in band the last 3 years. Unfortunately, the flute the school provided this year was so badly worn down that the teacher put tape to hold it together. This flute was not only a great price, beautifully packaged, but provides her the capability to hit the right notes. Beautiful sounds and quality. She is extremely proud of her flute!
customer_reviews.author: L McLean

customer_reviews.title: If you can afford better get something else.
customer_reviews.text: This will be the second one I'm returning. The first one just stopped making the proper sound and I couldn't figure out why. The second one the keys started to tarnish after the first week! We avidly wipe it clean with the cleaning cloth every time so theres no reason for the tarnish.
customer_reviews.author: shimmertans

customer_reviews.title: Buy the extended warranty!
customer_reviews.text: This product lasted one year for my 6th grader. Starting 7th grade after it sat for a summer a few of the keys wouldn't seal so she couldn't hit certain notes. Meyer Music wouldn't repair this brand, and their rentals and purchase prices were more than buying this same product again. So even if I had to buy her a new one from Amazon every year it would be more cost effective than buying elsewhere. I'm re-purchasing this same thing but opting for the extended warranty this time in case the same thing happens.
customer_reviews.author: Mar

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality flute
customer_reviews.text: Very poor quality flute. I purchased this for my daughter, who has played flute for two years. After receiving it, we determined the F key did not work. This has been something that is noted in many reviews. I didn't notice them until too late, though. Upon contacting the seller, they were not helpful at all. Their statement was to just return for a replacement, but by the time we decided to return it, it was too late. If you're considering buying a flute, my recommendation would be to save your money for a better quality flute.
customer_reviews.author: bncs_mom

customer_reviews.title: Glory flutes break down easily. Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Glory flutes break down easily. Do not buy. Find a better brand that will last. This flute lasted 2.5 months. I have bought 3 of the Glory flutes because my kid loves the color but they always break within 2-3 months.
customer_reviews.author: Maritza Chan

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend for beginner or amateur player
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to get back to playing after many years and discovered my old flute would be expensive to rebuild. I couldn’t believe I could get a new flute, blue to boot, for this price. I was skeptical, but I swear this is better than the flute I had in high school. I play a little every day and it still looks like new. I appreciate the case and the cleaning/tuning rod and cloth that came with it.
customer_reviews.author: Scooter Grama

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality and was unable to return due to the company's return policy of only 30 days.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Violet

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: Several key tabs (not a flute player not sure of the name) were loose. So quality of sound was not as it should be. Music repair store said repair would be more than it was to buy it. Don’t bother getting it. Wasted money. Rent one from a music store. Then it they decide to continue playing buy it. Much better than this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Renee S

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: Based on so many positive reviews for this instrument, I thought it would be perfect piece for marching band. It played nice out of the box, however within two days of using it had issues with the keys, pads, and screws. It appears that the metal used for these flutes is too soft so will not hold up as well with normal use. It was disappointing to say the least that the issues started pretty much right away. But, as the old adage goes - you truly get what you pay for. I need to find a good name brand refurbished flute for my daughter to use, since she still has four years of marching ahead of her.
customer_reviews.author: cheriba

customer_reviews.title: Purchased one of these before and it was perfect, lasted two years
customer_reviews.text: Purchased one of these before and it was perfect, lasted two years. This one came with a broken key, sent it right back with no hassle.
customer_reviews.author: melissa

customer_reviews.title: Superior quality for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I’m really impressed by the look and especially the sound of this flute! It’s my first concert flute and I had low expectations because of the price— all blown away. The care that went into the preparation for shipping (all of the keys were locked down for instance) reflects well on the quality of this instrument, but everything else pales compared to the ease with which I got such a satisfying beautiful tone — I’m in love with this instrument.
customer_reviews.author: AlanWd40

customer_reviews.title: Great flute
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! Even though my daughter's arrogant music teacher said otherwise. It compared great with the other flutes that were rented, or even the more "expensive" flutes that were played in her Spring Concert at school. My daughter stood out with her pretty blue flute and she sounded great! No complaints here. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mo4luv

customer_reviews.title: Great Flute... Stinky Case
customer_reviews.text: The flute plays well and seems to be good quality so far. I had to take away a star because of the terrible chemical smell that comes from the case. It is so bad I have to keep the case in the garage and I don't want to put the flute in it, which defeats the purpose of the case. The pads were a little sticky, which surprised me, but that can be fixed easily. Overall, not bad for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it! But...
customer_reviews.text: I want to give this 5 stars because it is beautiful, not broken and so on but I was trying to put the headpiece and body together and the holes seem to be the same exact size so one cannot go into the other. I’m not sure what I may be doing wrong, would love it if someone could help me! Also note: it did NOT come with all accessories pictured. Only a rod and stick of cork grease.
customer_reviews.author: Keri Flynn

customer_reviews.title: it's okay not too much good
customer_reviews.text: you have to blow air a lot , flute response too slow and needs too much air to blow from your lips and mouth but its ok for 4th graders band. not worth to play if you want to play for little longer time, you will tired after blowing lots of air by mouth.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon - HP

customer_reviews.title: Value and fantastic sound for a beginner instrument.
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent quality starter flute for a simply amazing price. It has a beautiful tone and is very easy to play. Bought this for my daughter, but her mom is an accomplished flute player and is very impressed with the quality and sound of this instrument. The materials are lower quality than a name brand flute and I wonder how easy it will be to service it, but given the price, that isn't a big concern. My daughter loves her flute and I am thrilled to be able to provide her a starter instrument for such a reasonable price. Also note that the accessories are quite nice.
customer_reviews.author: Geough

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my beginner daughter.
customer_reviews.text: The flute is well built and sounds just as good as the Yamaha rental the school started my daughter on. The carrying case and accessories are exactly what her school said she needed for class and the color choices are a nice extra. Good quality for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter who is in band at her elementary. We rented one for the first half of the year just to see if she would like the flute. She did, so buying this saved us A LOT of money than to continue to rent to own. She loves the color and she says it sounds just as good as the rent to own one from a local music store.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: This flute hit the note
customer_reviews.text: I bought this flute for my 11 year old daughter. She's taking band at school and choose to play the flute. I didn't want her borrowing or renting an instrument because I think any of the instruments that touch your lips should be your very own...I guess it's a personal thing. I'm glad I found this flute. She couldn't be happier and takes this flute with her everywhere we go and is constantly practicing or showing off what's she's learned so far. I would recommend this flute to others.
customer_reviews.author: knickknackgirl

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Good for beginners, and very affordable. The case is very nice and protected featuring many velcro straps and a extra compartment for other utility items that you would need with the flute. Good sound quality and great looks.
customer_reviews.author: Mary.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing material
customer_reviews.text: It's been 12 years since I haven't played the flute. I used to always be in competitions and missed getting 1st divisions. And when my husband got me this as a present I started to cry. It's been years from of playing and I still remember the notes and the sound is amazing. Easy for my kids to use too. Currently teaching them (7 and 5 year olds) to play
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Daughter loved it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter for band. I did not want to spend the 800 bucks from a music store for something that she may not want to do long term. This is a really good intro flute for kids just starting off. Good for the kids, because they can explore new talents. Great for parents because we do not have to drop 8 Benji's on a device that may or may not sit in a closet. Sound is good enough for middle school band.
customer_reviews.author: DS

customer_reviews.title: I play flute so I know how it should sound and I was a little disappointed that hers had something wrong with it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my sister and had to return it because the sounds the flute made were not right. I play flute so I know how it should sound and I was a little disappointed that hers had something wrong with it. I read other reviews that said the flute was good so it may have just been the flute we got. It shipped fast and I would definitely be willing to try from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Notes don’t have sound
customer_reviews.text: Value of money is good but no sound for some of notes . I started learning so excitedly but now i has to buy a new flute so it is good value but keep in mind you may end up buying an other one. Ps: I stated to take lessons couple weeks ago so I could not realize some notes don’t have any sound until I started to learn these notes, so I could not return it since it was already late to return it.
customer_reviews.author: O.Ak

customer_reviews.title: I'm in shock.
customer_reviews.text: While I was only shopping for a flute, I wasn't even convinced I'd get one until I saw this one... in my favorite color... When I saw one in my favorite color, priced very surprisingly affordable... Well, I got it from the mail as soon as it got here and I've been playing ever since. It's absolutely perfect. It is just beautiful, great quality of sound and material. Oh, and it got here like.. over a week early. Thank you!!!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great flute
customer_reviews.text: Great flute for practice at home. My daughters school has specific brands they want and this one isn’t on the list, but if you don’t want the kiddos to mess up that super expensive flute I would definitely get this for home practice. Makes beautiful sound and perfect for a beginner since it doesn’t have the holes in the keys.
customer_reviews.author: Smk043087

customer_reviews.title: poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Right out of the box, the instrument played well, but I started having trouble within just a couple of weeks. I had to make several adjustments to screws for the keys to line up and seal properly, and popped springs were not long enough to be able to fix. Local music shop does not repair this brand, due to known issues with low quality manufacturing. I returned the product within a month.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Lacy

customer_reviews.title: It's aight
customer_reviews.text: Decently playable. I am a music major, percussion and trumpet are my main instruments. I've started collecting instruments and saw this deal and figured it was worth a shot. Could be better, could be worse. For a beginning flute, it'll do just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Lane H.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: The nickel on this flute does tend to get dirty quickly, and the keys seem too light to the touch, but overall this is a great product for the price and the accessories that came with it. Good sound quality and easy on the low register. Very sturdy nice case.
customer_reviews.author: Canadian family

customer_reviews.title: I'm just enjoying being able to play the flute again
customer_reviews.text: I'm no pro. Played the flute middle through high school. My younger sibling has my old flute because they wanted to join the band as well. Finally got myself a new one and it's nice to know I still have at least on talent up my sleeve.
customer_reviews.author: Maddison Waddell

customer_reviews.title: Can I call it cute?
customer_reviews.text: I needed a simple, inexpensive flute to practice on so I could begin teaching again. I decided to get something fun since I'm not planning on joining any orchestras any time soon. This flute has a lovely tone and is a fun pink color that matches my hair. The pink is not baby pink, it's closer to hot pink. I love it. I'm enjoying picking up my skills again and this is plenty good enough for teaching a middle-schooler.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Gladstone

customer_reviews.title: Teacher approved
customer_reviews.text: Our music teacher said it was great. I don't personally know anything about flutes so I am glad this will work for band.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: It isn't pristine like a high end piece
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my daughter she plays in band at school. It definitely gets her by for class and for shows they do 3-4 times year. It isn't pristine like a high end piece. Good budget instrument.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Medina

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sound and comes with all the things that it ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome sound and comes with all the things that it tells you in the picture! I love the color and the floral design on it too. Super neat nice packaging and soft on your hand to touch and feel
customer_reviews.author: NT

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and amazing sound!
customer_reviews.text: This flute is amazing, the sound quality is stellar and the product quality is way better than I could’ve imagined. My daughter absolutely loves it! The only complaint I have is that the featured light pink flute in the picture came in as a magenta flute. My daughter says the color is good and she loves it, but I wish it would have been light pink as pictured.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel & Daniel Pangelina

customer_reviews.title: He's Happy with It!
customer_reviews.text: My son wanted to learn something new & has been watching lessons on YouTube. Decided to buy this & try it out. He's been happy with the purchase. (Just to note, he's truly a "beginner" & doesn't really know anything about playing this yet.)
customer_reviews.author: J. Jupa

customer_reviews.title: What fun colors!
customer_reviews.text: I just got my red flute today. I only ordered it for a band reunion, not for anything serious. It shipped faster than expected, and I appreciate the small wedges they included to protect the mechanisms during shipping. It would make a decent flute just for a high school marching season, if the player treats it well. It hit the low notes immediately, so on first playing I give it a thumbs up! $86 bucks for a little fun!
customer_reviews.author: J-Bar Y

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a blue with gold keys, and I love it so much! The colours are darker than in the image, but I prefer it! This honestly sounds better than many flutes- even some open hole! It's perfect for most types of bands or individual players. It comes with so many side items! Having something different really raised my confidence in flute and I am playing much better. Before I never owned a flute and used one of my friend's flutes as she had two, but some notes wouldn't work right on hers. This flute is amazing, and the colours don't end up all over your hands! I live this flute!
customer_reviews.author: Kennedi

customer_reviews.title: Excellent instrument for the price
customer_reviews.text: My daughter plays saxophone and has a very fine (expensive) alto sax. She wanted to teach herself flute (and clarinet) to be more versatile - most wind players who want to work in show bands need to play at least several different instruments. She is very happy with this entry-level flute, and after a few weeks had learned enough to play in a group performance. (This is a brag about her, not the flute, but the flute works well and sounds very nice .)
customer_reviews.author: J. Hansell

customer_reviews.title: Missing notes
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this item and it lasted one month. Good thing I purchase the warranty and they replaced it right away the first time. Sad to say five months later the keys are broken again and this time I’m still awaiting contact from the seller. I would not recommend this item if your child is in marching band and they practice every day just pay the money and get a good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A good beginner flute for the price
customer_reviews.text: I played flute for 3 years in my school band and it's been about 2 years since then so I wanted to pick it up again. Everything was packaged nicely, all the items were included and it arrived 5 days early. It plays as nice as the flute I played in my school band and I think it's perfect for the price. One of the pieces were difficult to put on at first but i used the joint grease and it went on smoothly. It's a little difficult to get higher notes but that's how my school flute was AND it's great for the price. I'm glad I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: alex

customer_reviews.title: It's great, except........
customer_reviews.text: At first, I thought it was great. Then as time went on, the lip plate's (on the mouthpiece) paint began to wear off. It wasn't too big of a deal, as it wasn't very visible, especially when playing. Then I noticed tarnish begin to appear on my lips. Turn out I may have had an allergic reaction of some sort to the material (probably the nickel silver). My solution was to order lip plate patches, and I'm optimistic about it, so everything should work itself out. Otherwise, it's a great flute, especially for its low price, so it was definitely worth the buy rather than spending $300+ at other places.
customer_reviews.author: Richard I.

customer_reviews.title: It's a really great starter flute but has a problem hitting anything above ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a really great starter flute but has a problem hitting anything above mid range. Second and third octaves are near impossible without sounding VERY shrill. Definitely a flute one grows out of quickly. If you're a serious musician, or wanting something to grow into splurge on something a bit more expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Audra

customer_reviews.title: Great for price
customer_reviews.text: Got this as an extra flute for my daughter to practice at home. She kept forgetting to bring her flute to school, so now she can keep her other flute at school. No excuses not to practice! This is great for the price and she loves the color!
customer_reviews.author: Sonja Riggs

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful finish and sound
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE the finish. Beautiful. Played 1 note and sounded really good. The only downside was the strap. I hooked the strap up only to find a piece was broken and the hook wasn’t even attached to the hook on one end. Guess for now I will just be using the hand straps and not the shoulder strap
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work😕
customer_reviews.text: While this instrument was packaged beautifully with care and attention to detail. Sadly, it did not work well at all. I was not able to get more than a few airy notes at best out of it. I am a musician in a jazz ensemble and wanted this to be a fun double instrument. It was gorgeous looking but if it doesn’t work, it’s useless. I was very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: LHA

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy this
customer_reviews.text: I just ordered it yesterday and I just got it today unfortunately the notes don't play I want to return it I want my money back. I was excited to play with it now that I have some free time.
customer_reviews.author: blackinahSF

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money - leaks like crazy
customer_reviews.text: Broke in 1 week. We bought it so my college aged advanced flutist could teach her elementary school niece. The instrument is a failure. Lots of leaks. Just a waste. Buy a used flute from a music shop where it has been tested.
customer_reviews.author: Ozzi

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t last more than a night.
customer_reviews.text: When I first received this flute, I was super excited! It was gorgeous and played nicely when I paired it with my Yamaha head joint. It didn’t last me long though. I was only able to play for one night and then It sounded ugly. There was a leak in the A key. It didn’t last me one night! I was so upset! Sent it back right away.
customer_reviews.author: Juan

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I can tell it is very well made and it has a beautiful tone. Amazing value. I heard a professional flautist perform it along with a $3200 flute. To my ear, it stood up just fine. Excited to get back into playing with this instrument.
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: You spend a bit more money on something better
customer_reviews.text: Would not buy again. Had to return the item could not fix leaks. Overall loved the color and when it played it sounded good just don't have the know-how on how to fix it properly
customer_reviews.author: Jason A Greenhalgh

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I love this flute! It sounds perfect! I'm a beginner/intermediate player and it was so worth the money! It's great for those who would like to continue playing as a hobby.
customer_reviews.author: Phoua

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and fair price.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and fair price. I was shocked to find out the instrument my wife had ok'd renting through the school for my daughter was something like $35/mo. I quickly ordered this and had my daughter return the rental. My daughter loved the color, and I love not paying $35/mo.
customer_reviews.author: NetMagi

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product.
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product. Lasted 1 month and now doesn't play above C unusable, but past the return limit so we are stuck with it. Not worth a penny! do Not buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Terry E. Stanley

customer_reviews.title: Was great for my 5th grade daughter who was in beginning ...
customer_reviews.text: This is such a cute flute. Was great for my 5th grade daughter who was in beginning band. The case was sturdy and even after a season of band there is lots of life left in this flute!!
customer_reviews.author: Hilary R.

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves her blue flute.
customer_reviews.text: I don’t play flute. My daughter just started learning. She likes it, so I’m ok with the purchase. Very light duty, seems like a throwaway unit to me though. Just doesn’t feel like well built.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin P Furlong

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Flute .
customer_reviews.text: This is my younger daughters first year in band and deciding between renting or buying was not even a thought . The flute it very well made . Came in a very nice velvet lined compact case that does not look one bit as you would think for the price . My daughters band teacher was over all happy with the sound and quality of this flute and I would 100 % recommend for any parent who student is starting out . I would purchase from this company again .
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Not a top-of-the-line instrument, but there’s absolutely nothing wrong with it. I bought it because I’ve played in the past and missed it. It works perfectly and the color is fantastic! I would buy again. (Actually plan on buying two, for my kids to learn on)
customer_reviews.author: LadyH

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: For the money, it’s great. I’m no flautist, but this is more than adequate to learn on, and way cheaper than renting. I’ve used it to record and perform.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Rose

customer_reviews.title: Keeping in tuned
customer_reviews.text: I bought this flute for my daughter. She played the flute since fourth grade and we always used to pay $10.00 to the school every year but now that she has graduated and is a freshman in college she and i decided to keep her skills sharp. She loves the fact that she has her own that she can play whenever and wherever.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Lane

customer_reviews.title: Better than renting!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 10 year old, the schools rental program was ridiculous. This seems to be meeting all of the requirments with no problems. Also this was literally 8 times cheaper then the school districts rental.
customer_reviews.author: Lance

customer_reviews.title: Great affordably
customer_reviews.text: Love the color options. My kid loves it and has much fun playing it. It's not perfect and better quality's are out there. But for the price it cant be beat.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Gilmore

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a music expert. I bought this instead of the $400 model the schools partner was pushing. No complaints from my son or the music teacher.
customer_reviews.author: El Hikador

customer_reviews.title: Money wasted
customer_reviews.text: Although nice looking its build is poor quality! Daughter ended up not being able to use for her lessons, her music instructor had to fix the screws almost daily. Disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: I think the flute is great but i haven't played in over 20 years which is why i purchased this one, it was inexpensive yet quality. I would definitely reccommend it to anyone who needs one. It is also great for a beginner too.
customer_reviews.author: Doctor who addict

customer_reviews.title: This flute is attractive just for looking but not for ...
customer_reviews.text: This flute is attractive just for looking but not for function. It stopped making B-flat after a few times using. The music teacher could not fix it because one of the holes could not close properly. If you are serious in learning flute, this is not for you.
customer_reviews.author: CocoFu

customer_reviews.title: Breaks easily - get the warranty
customer_reviews.text: Get the protection plan. Music teacher warned me it would break easily. Made it from August to early December when valves stopped working. Luckily I got the Asurion protection and they reimbursed me for another flute.
customer_reviews.author: PapaBeard2020

product_meta.title: Glory Closed Hole C Flute With Case, Tuning Rod and Cloth,Joint Grease and Gloves Nickel Siver-More Colors available,Click to see more colors
product_meta.description: Color:Nickel1)Before delivery, our flute are tested by professional quality inspector again to verify that they meet our standards. 2)Made from Real CUPRONICKEL Closed Hole 16 Keys Design 3)Key of C with C Footjoint,High Quality Pads 4)Free Tuning Rod, Polish Cloth, Cork Grease,White Gloves

The leather pad offers great water resistance and air tightness
Made from Real CUPRONICKEL which contributes to high durability and wonderful tone.
The high grade needle spring has a long lifetime and ensures good

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars1,741 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
